page.title: 15INTERVIEW WITH A POSTMASTER
page.content: Interview with Mr. Hopkins postmaster ------------------------------------- at Edwardsville post office. ----------------------------- We visited the postmaster at Edwardsville post office and after asking many questions we were able to deduce the following information. Mr. Hopkins has been sub-postmaster at Edwardsville for thirty five years. The post office has been on its presant site since 1915. Previously it had been in the bicycle shop on the main Cardiff to Merthyr road but that building was badly damaged by the tornado in 1913. As many post offices these days sell other things e.g. sweets, soft drinks etc., we asked Mr. Hopkins why he did not. He said that they had sold sweets but due to ill health he had to give up half of his shop and now it is a postoffice.
